vo-dml:model.name: proposal
vo-dml:model.description: A model to represent an application for observing time. The model is intended to express all of the concepts required to specify the scientific parameters of the application in sufficient detail to allow the proposal to be reviewed and allocated time. It does not cover all the technical detail of instrument setup that would be needed to actually schedule the observations, although the intention is that information about targets etc. could be automatically transferred to an observing system.
vo-dml:model.title: TBD
vo-dml:model.author: Paul Harrison

enumeration.name: TextFormats
enumeration.description: acceptable text formats for document submission

objectType.name: ObservingProposal
objectType.description: a complete proposal

attribute.name: summary
attribute.description: a short summary/abstract of the proposal

objectType.name: RelatedProposal
objectType.description: a related proposal

objectType.name: Person
objectType.description: person connected with the proposal

attribute.name: fullName
attribute.description: The given names for the person

attribute.name: eMail
attribute.description: an email that can be used to communicate with the person

attribute.name: forPhD
attribute.description: is the investigator making proposal for their PhD

objectType.name: Organization
objectType.description: An institution that is a collection of people

attribute.name: ivoid
attribute.description: the registry identifier for the organization

attribute.name: wikiId
attribute.description: the wikidata id for the Organization

objectType.name: Observatory
objectType.description: An organisation that can perform astronomical observations

composition.name: telescopes
composition.description: the telescopes that the observatory controls

composition.name: instruments
composition.description: the instruments that are available for the telescopes

composition.name: arrays
composition.description: any arrays of telescopes that typically operate together

attribute.name: wikiId
attribute.description: the wikidata id for the Instrument

objectType.name: TelescopeArray
objectType.description: a set of telescopes that are operated together for an observation

composition.name: arrayMembers
composition.description: the telescopes that make up the array

objectType.name: Instrument
objectType.description: An instrument that can be attached to a telescope - e.g. CCD, Radio Receiver

attribute.name: wikiId
attribute.description: the wikidata id for the Instrument

attribute.name: reference
attribute.description: a URL that points to a more detailed description of the instrument

composition.name: frequencyCoverage
composition.description: the frequency range that the instrument covers

objectType.name: Backend
objectType.description: a processing backend /pipeline- e.g. correlator

attribute.name: parallel
attribute.description: is capable of being run at same time as other backends

objectType.name: ObservingConfiguration
objectType.description: A particular observation combination that is possible

objectType.name: ObservingMode
objectType.description: a collection of configs that can be chosen to observe with.

objectType.name: Justification
objectType.description: The justification for the proposal. Note that the justification is for reading by humans and is not parsed to extract things like source lists - that sort of information must be entered in the correct place in the model.

attribute.name: text
attribute.description: the full text of the justification

objectType.name: SupportingDocument
objectType.description: a document

objectType.name: Target
objectType.description: A target source

attribute.name: sourceName
attribute.description: A common name for the source

objectType.name: CelestialTarget
objectType.description: The basic target setup for a celestial Target.

attribute.name: positionEpoch
attribute.description: the epoch at which the position was measured

objectType.name: Field
objectType.description: Definition of an observing field pointing

objectType.name: TargetField
objectType.description: the field points to the associated target

objectType.name: Point
objectType.description: Single point on the sky

objectType.name: Polygon
objectType.description: Polygonal map

objectType.name: Ellipse
objectType.description: Specialization of a Field for an elliptical map.

objectType.name: Constraint
objectType.description: a form of constraint on the observation

objectType.name: TimingConstraint
objectType.description: Any specific timing requirements for the observing

objectType.name: TimingWindow
objectType.description: particular time range

objectType.name: SimultaneityConstraint
objectType.description: A constraint that requires that two observations occur simultaneously

objectType.name: PointingConstaint
objectType.description: A constraint that limits the telescope pointing

objectType.name: ScienceSpectralWindow
objectType.description: A spectral window for science use.

objectType.name: SpectralWindowSetup
objectType.description: Science oriented definition of a spectral window.

attribute.name: start
attribute.description: The start of the spectral window

attribute.name: end
attribute.description: The end of the spectral window

objectType.name: ExpectedSpectralLine
objectType.description: Brief description of a spectral line.

objectType.name: PerformanceParameters
objectType.description: The parameters required for observation to be useful for the science goal

attribute.name: representativeSpectralPoint
attribute.description: the the point in the EM where these parameters should be evaluated

reference.name: target
reference.description: The actual target of the observation

reference.name: tech
reference.description: The technical goals of the observation

objectType.name: TargetObservation
objectType.description: an observation of the scientific target

objectType.name: CalibrationObservation
objectType.description: An observation that is intended for calibration

attribute.name: intent
attribute.description: The use of the calibration observation

objectType.name: TechnicalGoal
objectType.description: collects together the technical goals of the proposal
